Manx: As niart my chree ta nish falleil
English: And strength of my now-failing heart,
Diplomatic: As niart my chree ta nish falleil

Manx: Cur dou un shilley jeh dy oaie
English: Give me one sight of your face,
Diplomatic: Cur dou un shilley jeh dy oie

Manx: As lieen my annym lesh dty ghraih
English: And fill my soul with your love.
Diplomatic: As lieen my annym lesh dy ghraih

Manx: O jean mee aarloo Hiarn ayns shoh
English: O make me ready here Lord,
Diplomatic: O jean mee aarloo Hiarn ayns shoh

Manx: Dy ve mayrt Hene ayns yn vea noa
English: To be with you in new life,
Diplomatic: Dy ve mayrt Hene ayns yn vea noa

Manx: Dy ooashlagh ec dty chassyn lhie
English: To worship lying at your feet,
Diplomatic: Dy ooaishlagh eck dy chassyn lhie

Manx: Tra nee Oo goaill my annym thie
English: When you take my soul home.
Diplomatic: Tra nee Oo ghoaill my annym thie
